sections.prefix: Over the past six months, how often have you
questions: had difficulty concentrating on what people are saying to you even when they are speaking to you directly?
left your seat in meetings or other situations in which you are expected to remain seated?
had difficulty unwinding and relaxing when you have time to yourself?
found yourself finishing the sentences of the people you are talking to before they can finish them themselves when you're in a conversation?
put things off until the last minute?
depended on others to keep your life in order and attend to details?
